languages.text: "Каждый Вольный Торговец заботится, чтобы на флагмане было подобающее место упокоения, ибо столица может меняться от века к веку, а корабль помазанника Императора служит тысячелетиями — это не просто символ власти династии, а источник ее могущества и пустотный престол, откуда Лорд-капитан правит владениями".

"Every Rogue Trader takes care to maintain an appropriate place of repose on board their flagship. For their capital may change with the passing of centuries, but the vessel of the Emperor's anointed serves them for millennia. It is more than just a symbol of the dynasty's authority — it is the source of its power, the Lord Captain's seat in the void whence they reign over their many lands."
languages.original_text: "Каждый Вольный Торговец заботится, чтобы на флагмане было подобающее место упокоения, ибо столица может меняться от века к веку, а корабль помазанника Императора служит тысячелетиями — это не просто символ власти династии, а источник ее могущества и пустотный престол, откуда Лорд-капитан правит владениями".

It is more than just a symbol of the dynasty's authority — it is the source of its power, the Lord Captain's seat in the void from where they reign over their many lands."

languages.text: «Todo Comerciante Independiente se asegura de mantener un lugar de descanso apropiado en su nave insignia, pues su capital puede cambiar con el paso de los siglos, pero la nave de los ungidos del Emperador les sirve durante milenios. Es más que un símbolo de la autoridad de la dinastía: es la fuente de su poder, el asiento de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán en el vacío, desde el que gobiernan su extenso dominio».
languages.original_text: "Every Rogue Trader takes care to maintain an appropriate place of repose on board their flagship. For their capital may change with the passing of centuries, but the vessel of the Emperor's anointed serves them for millennia. It is more than just a symbol of the dynasty's authority — it is the source of its power, the Lord Captain's seat in the void whence they reign over their many lands."

traits.locale_text: «Todo Comerciante Independiente se asegura de mantener un lugar de descanso apropiado en su nave insignia, pues su capital puede cambiar con el paso de los siglos, pero la nave de los ungidos del Emperador les sirve durante milenios. Es más que un símbolo de la autoridad de la dinastía: es la fuente de su poder, el asiento de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán en el vacío, desde el que gobiernan su extenso dominio».

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダーは皆、旗艦に安息の場所を確保しようと努力をしています。彼らの首都は何世紀も経てば変わるかもしれませんが、皇帝の油注がれた船は何千年も彼らに仕えます。 それは単に王朝の権威の象徴だけではありません。それは王朝の権力の源であり、多くの国々に君臨するロード・キャプテンの座であります」
languages.original_text: "Every Rogue Trader takes care to maintain an appropriate place of repose on board their flagship. For their capital may change with the passing of centuries, but the vessel of the Emperor's anointed serves them for millennia. It is more than just a symbol of the dynasty's authority — it is the source of its power, the Lord Captain's seat in the void whence they reign over their many lands."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダーは皆、旗艦に安息の場所を確保しようと努力をしています。彼らの首都は何世紀も経てば変わるかもしれませんが、皇帝の油注がれた船は何千年も彼らに仕えます。 それは単に王朝の権威の象徴だけではありません。それは王朝の権力の源であり、多くの国々に君臨するロード・キャプテンの座であります」

languages.text: “每位行商浪人都会小心翼翼，在旗舰上为自己保留一片长眠之地。因为行商浪人的首都世界可能会随着时间的流逝而改变，但帝皇神选者的虚空舰却会服侍他们数千年之久。这艘舰船并不仅仅象征着王朝的权威，更是王朝的力量之源，是领主舰长在虚空之中的王座，主宰麾下的无数世界。”
languages.original_text: "Every Rogue Trader takes care to maintain an appropriate place of repose on board their flagship. For their capital may change with the passing of centuries, but the vessel of the Emperor's anointed serves them for millennia. It is more than just a symbol of the dynasty's authority — it is the source of its power, the Lord Captain's seat in the void whence they reign over their many lands."

traits.locale_text: “每位行商浪人都会小心翼翼，在旗舰上为自己保留一片长眠之地。因为行商浪人的首都世界可能会随着时间的流逝而改变，但帝皇神选者的虚空舰却会服侍他们数千年之久。这艘舰船并不仅仅象征着王朝的权威，更是王朝的力量之源，是领主舰长在虚空之中的王座，主宰麾下的无数世界。”

languages.text: "Alle Freihändler sind bemüht, einen angemessenen Rückzugsort an Bord ihres Flaggschiffs zu haben. Denn ihre Hauptstadt kann sich mit den Jahrhunderten ändern, doch das Schiff der vom Imperator Gesalbten dient ihnen über Jahrtausende. Es ist mehr als ein Symbol für die Autorität der Dynastie – es ist die Quelle ihrer Macht, der Sitz des Lord Captain in der Leere, von wo aus er seine zahlreichen Lande regiert."
languages.original_text: "Every Rogue Trader takes care to maintain an appropriate place of repose on board their flagship. For their capital may change with the passing of centuries, but the vessel of the Emperor's anointed serves them for millennia. It is more than just a symbol of the dynasty's authority — it is the source of its power, the Lord Captain's seat in the void whence they reign over their many lands."

traits.locale_text: "Alle Freihändler sind bemüht, einen angemessenen Rückzugsort an Bord ihres Flaggschiffs zu haben. Denn ihre Hauptstadt kann sich mit den Jahrhunderten ändern, doch das Schiff der vom Imperator Gesalbten dient ihnen über Jahrtausende. Es ist mehr als ein Symbol für die Autorität der Dynastie – es ist die Quelle ihrer Macht, der Sitz des Lord Captain in der Leere, von wo aus er seine zahlreichen Lande regiert."

languages.text: « Tous les libres-marchands veillent à aménager à leur bord un lieu propice au dernier repos. Car si leur capitale peut changer au fil des siècles, les vaisseaux des élus de l'Empereur servent leur mission sacrée pendant des millénaires. Plus qu'un simple symbole de l'autorité exercée par telle ou telle dynastie, c'est la source même de sa puissance, le siège du pouvoir de son seigneur-capitaine, d'où il règne sans partage sur de vastes territoires disséminés à travers la galaxie. »
languages.original_text: "Every Rogue Trader takes care to maintain an appropriate place of repose on board their flagship. For their capital may change with the passing of centuries, but the vessel of the Emperor's anointed serves them for millennia. It is more than just a symbol of the dynasty's authority — it is the source of its power, the Lord Captain's seat in the void whence they reign over their many lands."

traits.locale_text: « Tous les libres-marchands veillent à aménager à leur bord un lieu propice au dernier repos. Car si leur capitale peut changer au fil des siècles, les vaisseaux des élus de l'Empereur servent leur mission sacrée pendant des millénaires. Plus qu'un simple symbole de l'autorité exercée par telle ou telle dynastie, c'est la source même de sa puissance, le siège du pouvoir de son seigneur-capitaine, d'où il règne sans partage sur de vastes territoires disséminés à travers la galaxie. »

languages.text: "Tüm Hür Tacirler sancak gemilerinde uygun bir istirahat mekânı bulundurmaya özen gösterir. Nihayetinde başkentler yüzyıllar içinde değişebilir ancak İmparator tarafından kutsanmış olanların gemisi onlara bin yıllarca hizmet eder. Hanedanlığın otoritesinin bir sembolü olmaktan öte bir şeydir, onun gücünün kaynağıdır. Lord Kaptan'ın uçsuzdan diyarlarına hükmettiği mekândır."
languages.original_text: "Every Rogue Trader takes care to maintain an appropriate place of repose on board their flagship. For their capital may change with the passing of centuries, but the vessel of the Emperor's anointed serves them for millennia. It is more than just a symbol of the dynasty's authority — it is the source of its power, the Lord Captain's seat in the void whence they reign over their many lands."
